data.text: @NYeoman @Deke15 Agree.  I'm boycotting SW films at the cinema as a result.

@NYeoman @jakequery @ScottJSander How many of the tracks that spent money to remove seats would have had to do that if they only hosted one Cup event per year? TBH I don't keep track of that but when you can reduce capacity by 30% and still have empty seats, you have too much product to sell.
@NYeoman Just saw Solo yesterday. It was enjoyable.

@ScottJSander @NYeoman This, to me, is what I believe has happened to the NFL. I know people want to talk about all different factors for waning interest- but I think a BIG part of it is it’s become too ubiquitous.

@NYeoman I do think a big part of the appeal used to be the long wait between each chapter.  Now there’s no wait, so... 🤷🏽‍♂️ 

About Snoke - I finally realized what that all felt like: a room on an old NES Mario or Zelda game. Might as well have thrown berries at him.

@ScottJSander Glad I’m not the only one feeling this way. It’s just bizarre. I just lost the buzz. I’m hopeful that Episode IX can write some wrongs and bring me back but you’re right, “something happened” to a lot of fans.

@NYeoman I didn’t -hate- The Last Jedi, but something sure happened.
I cannot believe that I’m just fine waiting for Solo on teevee.  My 7-y/o self is VERY disappointed with my 46-y/o self. Heck, my 43-y/o self is stunned, too. I -ran- to Rogue One 🤔

@Deke15 Lots of plot holes, zero backstory to Snoke, a mismanagement of both the Luke and Leia characters, an awful CGI side quest for Rose and Finn and new interpretations of the force (holograms and mind melting) that strays far from what was known 7 movies in. It was just a mess.
@NYeoman I completely agree. TFA was very JJ, to be expected, but last Jedi just had half a movie that didn’t matter at all and a giant plot hole

@Deke15 Yeah I loved Rouge One and I'll definitely go see Solo. I was all aboard the new films after Force Awakens but maaaaan did The Last Jedi sour some things for me. Trying not to be that type of fan boy though
@NYeoman Solo is a good time though. I’ve enjoyed the anthology movies wayyyyy more than the new trilogy.
